bill.summary:
Federal Information Resource to Strengthen Ties with State and Local Law Enforcement Act of 2021 or the FIRST State and Local Law Enforcement Act
This bill requires the Department of Homeland Security's Office for State and Local Law Enforcement to report annually on its activities.
